Producer: Marc D. Evans, Peter Principato, Joel Zadak, Itay Reiss
Synopsis: Best friends Mia and Mel run their own cosmetics company -- a business they built from the ground up. But they're also in over their heads financially, and the prospect of a buyout offer from an industry titan proves too tempting to pass up. The beauty business is now about to get ugly as the proposal puts Mia and Mel's lifelong friendship to the ultimate test.
Title: Like a Boss
